Articles.Content:
This is a game about the meme "Kerbals control our space program while we control their space program". The rule is pretty simple: Make up a evidence of Kerbals control our civilization and cause our failures! 

Example: 

Poster 1: The failure of Apollo 1 is caused by a Kerbal that dropped a incendiary in the wrong place. 

Poster 2: the explosion of the Apollo 13 service bay is caused by a mod called Kaboom. 

Me First: 

The failure of the recently Soyuz is caused by a Kerbal who forgot to use decopler correctly. 

Edited October 24, 2022 by Abel Military Services

1957 Vanguard TV-3 explodes on launch. Investigation determined that several packages of  "Snacks" had been stored in the TT18-A Launch Stability Enhancer next to one of the tubes delivering coolant to the vessel. This also had the effect of disabling the release mechanism.  When asked for comment flight engineer Bill Kerman replied "the refrigerator was full".
All explosions of the N-1 were due to a kerbal forgetting to autostrut the truss interstages.

4 hours ago, Rutabaga22 said:


All explosions of the N-1 were due to a kerbal forgetting to autostrut the truss interstages.

And also just reverting to launch and trying again without any major changes

（Actually you can post bad things happened on humans）

The MH370 accident (Sorry for those guys who suffered from this accident)is caused by a top secret program that is about Teleport and <REDACTED>. The plane is carrying a prototype that accidentally activated and teleported the plane directly into the <REDACTED>. The next day, a Kerbal Black Ops team found it and take it back to R&D. 

Edited October 24, 2022 by Abel Military Services

Us Airways 1549 was ACTUALLY caused by kerbals that piloted bird drones.

Birds are drones.

Birds are drones. 

Birds are drones.

B - Bipolar 

I - Insurance 

R - Robotic

D - DRONES

Spoiler

Birds are drones.

 

Edited October 24, 2022 by Aerodynamic Kerbal
Birds are drones
The sls has been delayed so much because the Kerbals forgot how to rebuild that one engine and had way too much time and budget.
I think SLS is actually just a craft for harvesting science around the KSC
The WWII is caused by a kerb who *accidentally* created pedant.
The time when Russia's rocket decided to headbutt the ground but the Kerbals didn't put the explosives on it, they wanted to make a Orion drive powerd chair without nukes.

Both the Chernobyl and 3-Mile Island incidents were caused by the same Kerbal (Jonfrid) thinking that the large red buttons on the panels to control the reactor functions were nothing more than just "shiny coasters".  Not that coffee was supposed to be allowed in the control rooms, but Jonfrid set his cup down on the large, red, shiny, candy-like buttons and boom!

The sls launch tower has costed over a billion dollars because the Kerbal wanted to make it out of toothpicks to save money, but then with there newfound wealth they tried gold bars and platinum... Both ideas failed so they finally settled on super expensive steel from a sketchy website.

Edited October 25, 2022 by Ryaja

The death of Kennedy is caused by a Kerbal Assassination Team who controlled the killer's mind and let him kill Kennedy. 

(Of course they are part of the KCP foundation)

BONUS: 

The Mir space station entered the atmosphere on 2001. It's caused by an antimatter research project called Project Pegasus. These research stuffs are top secret so The Kerbals crash it.
The Falcon 9 exploded on pad once because a kerbal forgot to check staging.

2 minutes ago, Smart Boy said:

The Falcon 9 exploded on pad once because a kerbal forgot to check staging.

Hey you're back! 

Remember that "the greatest technical support call"? It was caused by Jeb who wants to mine Kerbacoin but his computer was busy. So he just mindlessly installed the mine program on the computer and go for a walk.
